subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: The 1987 Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner Alysheba has died at the age of 25. The champion stallion was euthanized Friday night at a medical center in Lexington, Ky. The Kentucky Horse Park said he was buried Saturday at its Hall of Champions. Alysheba won the Breeders’ Cup in 1988 and was Horse of the Year.
